title: How to Use a Pistol in Assassin's Creed II

steps.headline: Bring up the equipment selection screen and select the pistol, it should be right next to the hidden blade.
Find a suitable target to unleash your attack on, and lock onto him.
Hold the attack button until you see a straight white line coming from Ezio's wrist, and going straight to your target.
steps.description: Once you see this line, let go of the attack button.

steps.headline: Once you've killed your target, loot his body if you like and reap the rewards, or run and become anonymous if any guards have seen you.

text: Bring up the equipment selection screen and select the pistol, it should be right next to the hidden blade.  Find a suitable target to unleash your attack on, and lock onto him.  Hold the attack button until you see a straight white line coming from Ezio's wrist, and going straight to your target. Once you see this line, let go of the attack button. Once you've killed your target, loot his body if you like and reap the rewards, or run and become anonymous if any guards have seen you.
